txt.en: 'Are you looking to become a \qFriend\q of the Riders of Stangard? I can help you with that if you complete this quest!\n\n'Speak to me again when you are ready.'
'Alright, soon you will be a Friend of the Riders of Stangard. Ready?'
Great River - Riders of Stangard II
Talk to the friendly rep Man to continue
By completing this quest, you will be considered a Friend of the Riders of Stangard.
